posts.post_title: F/S: 60+ Graded T206 Cards - All SGC 30
posts.post_content:
Prices lowered on Mathewson, McGraw and Demmitt. For sale are 61 - graded T206 cards all SGC 30.  All prices include shipping and handling.  PayPal and other forms of payment accepted.  Cards and pricing can be viewed by going to [url]http://imageevent.com/kodiaks_t206_cards/kodiakst206cards[/url]

Scans can be enlarged by clicking on image.

Please direct all inquiries to my email address - [url]dmjt913@epbfi.com[/url]

Thanks for your interest.

Dave
